alert.note: Alert for Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 12:31PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Taylor County through 115 PM EDT... At 1230 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles southwest of Perry to 29 miles northwest of Steinhatchee to 42 miles west of Horseshoe Point. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Perry, Pinland, Fish Creek, Jug Island, Secotan, Boyd, Smith, Adams Beach, Dekle Beach, Jack Lee Island, Keaton Beach, Bird Island, Foley, Blue Springs, Perry-Foley Airport, Bucell Junction, Athena, Hampton Springs, Cedar Island and Fenholloway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
